SEARCH
Package edu.ntnu.stud.entity

Class TrainDeparture

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.stud.entity.TrainDeparture
public class TrainDeparture extends Object
Represents a train departure with train number, destination, departure time, track number, train line and delay time.

  • Constructor Details

    • TrainDeparture

      public TrainDeparture(String departureTime, String trainLine, int trainNumber, String trainDestination, int trackNum, String amountDelayed)
      Creates an instance of TrainDeparture.
      Parameters:
      departureTime - Time of the departure. Must be written in hh:mm format. If it isn't it will be set to 00:00.
      trainLine - Train line. If it is empty it will be set to an empty string.
      trainNumber - Train number. If it is not a positive 1 or 2-digit number it will be set to -1.
      trainDestination - Train destination. If it is empty it will be set to an empty string.
      trackNum - Track where the departure leaves from. If it is not a positive 1 or 2-digit number it will be set to -1.
      amountDelayed - Delay time of the departure. Must be written in hh:mm format. If it isn't it will be set to 00:00.

  • Method Details

    • getAmountDelayed

      public LocalTime getAmountDelayed()
      Returns the amount the departure is delayed in "hh:mm" format.
      Returns:
      delayTime The amount delayed in "hh:mm" format.

    • getDepartureTime

      public LocalTime getDepartureTime()
      Returns the initial departure time in "hh:mm" format.
      Returns:
      time The initial departure time in "hh:mm" format.

    • getExpectedTime

      public String getExpectedTime()
      Returns the expected time of the departure including the delay. If delay is 00:00, it will return an empty string.
      Returns:
      sumTime The expected time of the departure as a string in "hh:mm" format.

    • getTrainLine

      public String getTrainLine()
      Returns the train line.
      Returns:
      line The train line.

    • getTrainNumber

      public int getTrainNumber()
      Returns the train number.
      Returns:
      trainNumber The train number.

    • getDestination

      public String getDestination()
      Returns the train destination.
      Returns:
      destination The train's destination.

    • getTrackNumber

      public int getTrackNumber()
      Returns the track number.
      Returns:
      trackNumber The track number.

    • setDepartureTime

      public void setDepartureTime(String initialTime)
      Sets the initial departure time of the train departure. The given time must be written in hh:mm format. If it isn't it will be set to 00:00. Parts of the code used under was suggested by GitHub Copilot.
      Parameters:
      initialTime - the initial time of the train departure.

    • setAmountDelayed

      public void setAmountDelayed(String delayedTime)
      Sets the delay time of the train departure. The given time must be written in hh:mm format. If it isn't it will be set to 00:00. Parts of the code used under was suggested by GitHub Copilot.
      Parameters:
      delayedTime - the amount delayed in hh:mm format.

    • setTrackNumber

      public void setTrackNumber(int trackNum)
      Sets the track number where the train will depart from. If it is not a number between 1 and 99 it will be set to -1.
      Parameters:
      trackNum - the track number of the train.

    • setTrainLine

      public void setTrainLine(String trainLine)
      Sets the train line. If it is empty it will be set to an empty string.
      Parameters:
      trainLine - the train line of the train.

    • setDestination

      public void setDestination(String trainDestination)
      Sets the destination of the train. If it is empty it will be set to an empty string.
      Parameters:
      trainDestination - the destination of the train.
